basis_of_valuation_incoming_transits: Cost, Insurance and freight plus 10% (plus duty if declared)
basis_of_valuation_outgoing_transits: Assured's sales invoice less any unincurred expenses
basis_of_valuation_domestic_transits: London Metal Exchange value on date of loss plus 20% or as agreed
